articles.title: FTSE 100 slides again after week of market turmoil - The Telegraph
articles.description: The FTSE 100 has dropped again, rounding off a tumultuous week for global markets amid fears of interest rate rises and the looming threat of war in Europe.
articles.content:
Good morning.
Britain and the EU are said to be preparing sanctions on new Russian gas projects in retaliation for any attack on Ukraine.

articles.author: Joseph Henry
articles.title: iOS 15.4 to Add EU Digital COVID-19 Vaccination Records in Health, Wallet Apps - Tech Times
articles.description: European users can now add their COVID vaccination certificates in Apple Wallet and Health apps as part of the iOS 15.4 update.
articles.content: Apple will be adding a new feature for the iOS 15.4 beta for European users. According to the Cupertino giant, the COVID-19 vaccination certificates can now be added to the Wallet and Health applicat… [+3824 chars]
